ascend_skill.desc:
When using a skill, gain 1 Chosen One stack.
Chosen One: Increase the party's Fire damage by 5%. When Kurotani uses a skill, deal damage to Kurotani equal to 4% of his current HP. Lasts 2 turns and stacks up to 5 times.
The duration of Chosen One is handled individually for each stack.
While active, change Kurotani's ranged attacks to Fire.
ascend_skill.name: Make Sparks Fly

ascend_skill.desc: On Kurotani's action, for each stack of Chosen One, 12% chance to inflict Burn on 1 random foe.
ascend_skill.name: Uncontrollable Power

ascend_skill.desc: On Kurotani's action, for each Burning foe, increase Kurotani's damage by 8% for 1 turn. Counts up to 3 foes.
ascend_skill.name: Flaming Phenomenon

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Ring of Fire and Cleansing Flame by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Repent, Sinner

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase all foes' Fire damage taken by 30.8%.
ascend_skill.name: Untold Story

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Crimson Summon and Thief Tactics by 2.
ascend_skill.name: Exorcism

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the party's Fire damage by 30% for every 10 Chosen One stacks gained for 2 turns.
ascend_skill.name: Contagious Passion

highlight_skill.desc: Increase all foes' Fire damage taken by 30.1%/33.1%/31.3%/34.4%, and deal Fire damage equal to 41.5%/45.7%/43.2%/47.4% of Kurotani's max HP. Also inflict Burn on the foes for 2 turns.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 26.2%/28.8%/27.2%/29.9% of Kurotani's max HP and inflict Burn.
If the target is Burning, gain 1 Chosen One stack, change target to all foes, decrease damage dealt by half, and inflict Burn.
normal_skill.name: Ring of Fire

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 20.2%/22.3%/21.0%/23.1% of Kurotani's max HP, and activate a Fire Technical. After the attack, based on the number of foes that were inflicted with Burn, gain 2 Chosen One stacks.
Inflict Sacred Flame on Burning foes for 2 turns.
Sacred Flame: When a foe takes an action, deal Fire damage equal to 24.8%/27.3%/25.8%/28.3% of Kurotani's max HP.
normal_skill.name: Crimson Summon

normal_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 58.6%/64.6%/61.0%/67.0% of Kurotani's max HP and activate Fire Technical. When main target has Sacred Flame, activate a Technical and increase damage by 30%.
normal_skill.name: Cleansing Flame

passive_skill.desc: Increase Fire damage and elemental ailment damage dealt to foes with Sacred Flame by 6.0%, based on the number of Chosen One stacks.
passive_skill.name: Uplifting Embers

passive_skill.desc: Increase Fire damage based on max HP. Increase by 1% for every 300 HP (up to 9000).
passive_skill.name: Hot to the Touch
